revised_title: Investigating the Magnetism of Drills and the Influence of Heat on their Polarity
tldr: The author, Mr. Ballard, investigates the magnetism of drills and the influence of heat on their polarity. He discovers that drills can acquire a vigorous polarity during the hardening process and that heating an iron object through motion, such as drilling, can also bestow magnetism. The author also discusses the limitations of his experiments and the need for further research.
